name: subsonically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is slower than the speed of sound: The aircraft had to fly subsonically over India and Malaysia. This effect occurs whether the cold front is moving subsonically or supersonically.
More examplesFewer examplesWith the end of supersonic flight, new generations of air travellers now have to travel subsonically. The craft would take off subsonically with full fuel tanks.As supersonic flight is banned over the US, the plane will fly subsonically when it is over land.
